name: Heaven To Hell (Mohammad Sadain Syed)
description:
Heaven To Hell is a game where a Ghost (Bad) who is mistakenly drop into Heaven and the ghost is trying To find its way home which is Hell. Inside Heaven the Ghost cannot kill the Ghosts (Good) in the heaven so when we the Ghost shoots at them it freezes them for few secs but dont bump into them otherwise you will loose life.

It is a 2D platformer game build in Construct2, 

Controls

  • Move: Arrows Left and Right
  • Shoot: Space Bar
  • Jump: Up Arrow

Please note that the assets and the art is used in the game are found in the internet will soon post the links from where i got it from the internet.
